name: Rad Science: Golf
description:
NOTICE: There seems to be a bug in web versions of Godot games on itch where they randomly don't load,So I provided Win/Linux downloadables.

First gamejam game submitted to Weekly Game Jam #116.The theme was crazy golf.

Description:

In this game you are a mad scientist who has gained control of physics itself to boost his golf skills.He can make his machines exert whatever forces he likes on the ball and use his invented physics as the golf club.

INSTRUCTIONS:
To 'strike' the ball you press and hold enter - by doing that you turn the forcefields on and off and that counts as one stroke.

The main draw of the game is that you input equations for the X and Y coordinates for the field that each obstacle imparts on the ball.You can use any elementary mathematical function in the formulas and the position variables 'x' and 'y' for which the force is calculated and 'm' - the mass of the obstacle that is creating the field.

TIPS:
-Try changing the sign of the formulas.For example,if the forcefield would push the ball down and the hole is above,flip the sign of the y coordinate equation.
-With the default 'gravity' law , a useful maneuver is the slingshot - making the ball do a loop around a generator to change it's direction
